dmca.title: Cease & Desist Warning
dmca.body:
January 18, 2007

                                                                                    Via E-Mail

 

Chris Wedan

chriswedan@yahoo.com

 

Re:      Illegal tapes
 

 

Dear Chris:

 

Actors' Equity Association is the Union of Actors and Stage Managers working in the legitimate theatre.  It has come to Equity's attention that you offer to sell, distribute or trade unauthorized video and audio recordings of live musical performances by members of Actors' Equity.

 

Please be advised that 18 U.S.C. 2319A makes it a felony to transmit, distribute or offer to distribute for purposes of commercial advantage or private financial gain sound or video recordings "without the consent of the performer or performers involved." 

 

In addition, "bootleg" recordings, and their distribution, violate the copyright laws and the rights of Actors' Equity members under their collective bargaining agreements with theatrical producers.  

 

Equity therefore insists you cease further web references or links to these "bootleg" recordings immediately.  Equity is prepared if necessary to take appropriate legal action to ensure that its members' rights are protected.

 

Please contact me if you have any questions.

 

Sincerely,

 

ACTORS' EQUITY ASSOCIATION

 

(via email)

 

Dwane M. Upp
Taping & Filming Representative
Actors' Equity Association
165 West 46th Street
New York, NY 10036
212-869-8530 x 341
